staff.name: Mauricio Pochettino
staff.bio: Experienced manager with a focus on attacking football. Previously managed Tottenham, PSG, and Southampton.

staff.name: Jesús Pérez
staff.bio: Long-time assistant to Pochettino, known for tactical analysis and training methods.

staff.name: Miguel d'Agostino
staff.bio: Assistant coach specializing in defensive organization and set pieces.

stadiums.name: Old Trafford
stadiums.address: Sir Matt Busby Way, Manchester, M16 0RA
